desc:
This method adds a reaction (emoji) to an item (file, file comment, channel message, group message, or direct message).
One of file, file_comment, or the combination of channel and timestamp must be specified.

file_comment.desc: File comment to add reaction to.

channel.desc: Channel where the message to add reaction to was posted.

timestamp.desc: Timestamp of the message to add reaction to.

errors.bad_timestamp: Value passed for timestamp was invalid.
errors.file_not_found: File specified by file does not exist.
errors.file_comment_not_found: File comment specified by file_comment does not exist.
errors.message_not_found: Message specified by channel and timestamp does not exist.
errors.no_item_specified: file, file_comment, or combination of channel and timestamp was not specified.
errors.invalid_name: Value passed for name was invalid.
errors.already_reacted: The specified item already has the user/reaction combination.
errors.too_many_emoji: The limit for distinct reactions (i.e emoji) on the item has been reached.
errors.too_many_reactions: The limit for reactions a person may add to the item has been reached.
errors.account_inactive: Authentication token is for a deleted user or team.
